attributes.action: Bring back FULL A&E Services to Kidderminster Hospital (Otherwise know as Kidderminster General Hospital)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have lived in Kidderminster all my life. I have grown up with a General Hospital. And then it was taken away. Still struggling to get it back to what is was seems a far dream. But with the help of Dr. Richard Taylor who is a very dedicated & loyal man, we are acheiving our goals. I have worked in the British Red Cross for 3 years, & Kidderminster Hospital Radio 11 years, both of which I have had to retire from these volountary posts. My Nan also worked at Kidderminster hospital well before I was around. The most imoportant fact is: The Golden Hour. Anyone suffering from a heart attack MUST be attended to and conveyed to A&E within that hour. PLEASE re-open the life saving services for Kidderminster, and take the pressure off our much valued ambulance crews. We All need our Accident & Emergency Department back in Kidderminster. But we must remember our paramedics are under enough stress trying help people let alone plan a long journey. Thank you.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Bring back FULL A&E Services to Kidderminster Hospital (Otherwise know as Kidderminster General Hospital)"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18177


Prime Minister's Office
